GHA456053 Isola Ventura, LLC (Sale of 2578 Beacon Circle)        Any and all ad valorem taxes and assessments for the years prior to 2022 and for the year 2022 to the date of this Special Warranty Deed (this Deed) shall be paid by Grantor, and all ad valorem taxes and assessments for the year 2022 after the date of this Deed shall be paid by Grantee. Subject to the foregoing, such taxes and assessments for the year 2022 have been prorated between the parties hereto as of the effective date of this Deed, and Grantee assumes liability for the payment thereof. If such proration is based upon an estimate of such taxes and assessments for the year 2022, thirty (30) days after written demand from whichever of Grantor or Grantee has paid or given credit for more than its apportioned share of the taxes as adjusted in accordance with the actual figures for the tax year 2022, the other party hereto shall tender to the demanding party the balance of the paying partys recalculated proportion of all such taxes and assessments, which reapportionment shall take place as soon as actual figures for these items for the calendar year 2022 are available, and the party hereto which receives the applicable tax statements shall promptly upon such receipt, provide a copy of each such statement to the other party hereto. In making such apportionments, Grantor shall be responsible for taxes and other expenses accrued to the date of this Deed. If Grantee fails to timely and properly pay in full year 2022 property taxes prior to delinquency, Grantor shal] have the right to so do, and Grantee shall reimburse Grantor upon request for all taxes, penalties, interest, fees (inclusive of attorneys fees) and costs incurred or paid by Grantor in connection with Grantors payment as aforesaid or in connection with Grantors obtaining of Grantees reimbursement.   Grantee agrees that Grantor shall have, and hereby grants to Grantor, the right (but not the obligation) to repurchase the Property in the event Grantee does not, within thirty-six (36) months after the effective date of this Deed, commence the construction of a single family residence (a Residence) on the Property in accordance with the plans and specifications and other matters approved by Beacon Island Estate Owners Association, Inc. in accordance with the terms and conditions provided for in the Beacon Island Estate Owners Declaration of Covenants, Conditions and Restrictions and all amendments, restatements and/or modifications thereto (collectively, the Declarations), as recorded in the Real Property Records, which Declarations encumber the Property. For purposes of this Deed, the term or phrase commence(d), commencement of construction, commence the construction or commence construction shall mean the actual pouring by Grantee of a concrete foundation suitable for the construction of a Residence thereon, such foundation being constructed in full conformance with the Declarations (including, without limitation, any required approvals therein) and any and all laws, rules, ordinances and regulations governing same.   If Grantee fails to commence the construction of a Residence on the Property within the 36- month time limit set forth above, Grantor shall have the right to repurchase the Property by delivering written notice to Grantee after the expiration of such 36-month period and prior to commencement of construction of a Residence on the Property. The repurchase price to be paid by Grantor to Grantee for the Property repurchased shall be equal to the Sales Price as defined and provided for in Section 3 of that certain Unimproved Property Contract by and between Grantor and Grantee dated on or about March 4, 2022 as heretofore amended (the Purchase Agreement).   GHA456053 Isola Ventura, LLC (Sale of 2578 Beacon Circle)   In addition to that provided above, Grantee also agrees that Grantor shall have, and hereby grants to Grantor, a right of first refusal with respect to the Property, if Buyer desires to sell the Property prior to the completion thereon of a Residence. Grantee must first offer to sell the Property (or a portion thereof) to Grantor on the same terms and conditions, and Grantor shall have fifteen (15) days within which to inform Grantee of Grantors election to exercise its right of first refusal on such terms and conditions. The rights of Grantor under this paragraph and the preceding paragraph shall be assignable by Grantor to any third party in Grantors sole and absolute discretion.   Closing of the purchase and sale of the Property purchased or repurchased by Grantor hereunder shall occur at such time and place designated in writing by Grantor and shall occur no sooner than fifteen (15) days and no later than forty-five (45) days after Grantees receipt of written notice from Grantor regarding the exercise of its applicable rights. In any event, with respect to the repurchase option or right of first refusal, Grantee shall be obligated to re-convey to Grantor the Property by warranty deed and free and clear of any and all liens and claims placed upon the Property by Grantee or on behalf of Grantee not less than fifteen (15) or more than forty-five (45) days after written demand by Grantor. Notwithstanding anything herein to the contrary, upon the completion of construction of a Residence on the Property, Grantors rights to repurchase or right of first refusal to purchase the Property shall automatically terminate and be of no further force or affect.   Grantor and Grantee agree and acknowledge that time is of the essence and that the time periods provided for herein are basic parts of this Deed, and are not subject to extension unless pursuant to a written agreement signed by the parties hereto and recorded in the Real Property Records.   No verbal or parol agreement pertaining to the matters set forth herein shall be binding upon either of Grantor or Grantee. The terms and provisions hereof shall not be altered, changed or amended except by instrument in writing signed by the parties hereto that shall be recorded in the Real Property Records.   The terms and provisions hereof shall run with the land and be binding upon and inure to the benefit of the parties hereto and their respective successors and assigns. All subsequent conveyance of all or any part of the Property shall be subject to the Permitted Encumbrances to and all other terms, conditions, covenants and restrictions contained herein to the full extent. Special Warranty Deed with Enhanced Life Estate      1   This conveyance is made SUBJECT TO, all and singular, but only to the extent that the same are currently valid and enforceable against the Property, (a) all rights-of-ways and easements, whether of record or not, (b) all restrictions, covenants and conditions, reservations, mineral severances, oil and gas leases and all other instruments that affect the Property, and (c) rights, if any, of adjoining property owners of fences situated on a common boundary line.   For Grantor and Grantors assigns, a reservation of the full possession, benefit, and use of the Property for the remainder of the life of Grantor, as a life estate. Grantor further retains complete power, without the joinder of any person, to mortgage, sell, and convey the Property, in whole or in part, and to spend any proceeds; to exchange it for other property; to lease the surface and subsurface of the Property; to execute and deliver oil, gas, and other mineral leases for any term of years and for a term based on the continuing production of oil, gas, or other minerals from the Property, ending either before or after Grantors death; to grant any interest in the Property, by gift, sale or otherwise, so as to terminate the interests of Grantee, as Grantor in Grantors sole discretion shall decide; and to invest and reinvest all proceeds from the sale or other disposition of the Property. This life estate carries with it the right to possess and consume all bonuses, delay rentals, royalties, and other benefits payable on any mortgage, sale, or conveyance under oil, gas, and other mineral leases covering the property at the inception of this life estate without any duty to the remainderman and without liability for waste.   Grantor further reserves the right to cancel this deed by further conveyance, even to Grantor, which may destroy any and all rights which Grantee may possess under this deed. Upon the first death of one of the Grantors, all right, title and interest to their one-half interest in the Property remaining fully vest in the surviving Grantor.   Grantee shall hold a remainder interest in the Property and upon the death of Grantor, if the Property has not been previously disposed of prior to Grantors death, all right, title and interest to the Property remaining fully vest in Grantee, subject to such liens and encumbrances existing at that time.   If the Grantee fails to survive Grantor, all right, title and interest to the Property remaining fully vest in Grantees descendants who survive Grantee per stirpes. If none of Grantees descendants survive Grantee, all right, title and interest to the Property remaining fully vest in Grantors heirs at law.   Subject to the reservation of the life estate set forth above, TO HAVE AND TO HOLD the Grantors right, title and interest in and to the Property, subject to the matters herein set forth, together with all and singular the rights to appurtenances thereto in anywise belonging unto the Grantee, Grantees heirs, successors, executors, administrators, legal representatives, and assigns forever; and the Grantor does hereby bind Grantor, Grantors heirs, successors, executors, administrators, legal representatives, and assigns to WARRANT AND FOREVER DEFEND, all and singular the Grantors right, title and interest in and to the Property unto the Grantee, Grantees heirs, successors, executors, administrators, legal representatives, and assigns, against every person whomsoever lawfully claiming or to claim the same or any part thereof.   2   Special Warranty Deed with Enhanced Life Estate   Whenever the context of this Special Warranty Deed with Enhanced Life Estate requires (a) the singular nouns and pronouns include the plural, (b) any gender includes the other genders, and (c) the term successors and assigns includes legal representatives, heirs, executors, administrators, successors and assigns. Grantor further retains complete power, without the joinder of any person, to mortgage, sell, and convey the Property, in whole or in part, and to spend any proceeds; to exchange it for other property; to lease the surface and subsurface of the Property; to execute and deliver oil, gas, and other mineral leases for any term of years and for a term based on the continuing production of oil, gas, or other minerals from the Property, ending either before or after Grantors death; to grant any interest in the Property, by gift, sale or otherwise, so as to terminate the interests of Grantee, as Grantor in Grantors sole discretion shall decide; and to invest and reinvest all proceeds from the sale or other disposition of the Property. This life estate carries with it the right to possess and consume all bonuses, delay rentals, royalties, and other benefits payable on any mortgage, sale, or conveyance under oil, gas, and other mineral leases covering the property at the inception of this life estate without any duty to the remainderman and without liability for waste.   Grantor further reserves the right to cancel this deed by further conveyance, even to Grantor, which may destroy any and all rights which Grantee may possess under this deed. Upon the first death of one of the Grantors, all right, title and interest to their one-half interest in the Property remaining fully vest in the surviving Grantor.   Grantee shall hold a remainder interest in the Property and upon the death of Grantor, if the Property has not been previously disposed of prior to Grantors death, all right, title and interest to the Property remaining fully vest in Grantee, subject to such liens and encumbrances existing at that time.   If the Grantee fails to survive Grantor, all right, title and interest to the Property remaining fully vest in Grantees descendants who survive Grantee per stirpes. If none of Grantees descendants survive Grantee, all right, title and interest to the Property remaining fully vest in Grantors heirs at law.   Subject to the reservation of the life estate set forth above, TO HAVE AND TO HOLD the Grantors right, title and interest in and to the Property, subject to the matters herein set forth, together with all and singular the rights to appurtenances thereto in anywise belonging unto the Grantee, Grantees heirs, successors, executors, administrators, legal representatives, and assigns forever; and the Grantor does hereby bind Grantor, Grantors heirs, successors, executors, administrators, legal representatives, and assigns to WARRANT AND FOREVER DEFEND, all and singular the Grantors right, title and interest in and to the Property unto the Grantee, Grantees heirs, successors, executors, administrators, legal representatives, and assigns, against every person whomsoever lawfully claiming or to claim the same or any part thereof.   2   Special Warranty Deed with Enhanced Life Estate   Whenever the context of this Special Warranty Deed with Enhanced Life Estate requires (a) the singular nouns and pronouns include the plural, (b) any gender includes the other genders, and (c) the term successors and assigns includes legal representatives, heirs, executors, administrators, successors and assigns.
